meanings.sent1: The janiform statue in the museum had a face on each side.
meanings.sent2: The janiform coin featured a different design on each side.
meanings.sent3: The janiform clock confused everyone as it showed two different times at once.
meanings.sent4: Her janiform personality made it hard to predict her reactions.
meanings.sent5: The janiform mountain looked different from each side, like two separate peaks.

meanings.definition: Representing two different things at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The janiform painting depicted both day and night scenes.
meanings.sent2: The janiform symbol on the flag symbolized unity and diversity.
meanings.sent3: The janiform map showed both land and sea in a unique way.
meanings.sent4: His janiform art piece captured the essence of joy and sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The janiform sculpture blended two contrasting styles seamlessly.
